tool_description: Free real-time Currency Exchange rates API for 144 countries with simple REST API.
name: Currency Exchange
title: Currency Exchange

api_list.name: Get rates
api_list.description: List of all currency rates with one API call.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-exchange6.p.rapidapi.com/rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-exchange6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-exchange6.p.rapidapi.com/rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-exchange6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
